game.name: Stunt Simulator
game.description:
The highly engaging and addictive car racing game has hit your home today! Join Stunt Simulator and be prepared to challenge the rules of gravity and race through the deadly ramps to perform some amazing air stunts! Common boys! Nothing will work, but only testing your driving skills will help make your way towards the victory. Enjoy racing without being bounded within any time limits or other restrictions! Feel free to do all kinds of crazy tricks to create as many points as possible!

Choose a field from two options and then finalize a vehicle out of multiple options including Compact, Muscle, Super, Racer, Conception, APC, BIG RIG, Sport and Coupe! Rest your car whenever you want in case of being hit by any other vehicles moving around or other objects you see on the screen in this html5 car game! Put your fingers on the arrow keys or tap the screen to step on the gas pedal! Test your driving abilities to the maximum level in this radical driving game!

Performing every successful trick will reward you with some extra points. Take your seat on a gasoline turbo injected car and drive your vehicle around the streets of a city like a true racer in this car stunts game! There is no need to follow any law enforcement. Multiple AI drivers have already reached out to the city. This 3D car race game features 2 map locations, 10 vehicles, realistic physics and Car behavior configuration. Enjoy the high-quality fun without download on your device!
